data.meta_site_name: David Fisher Obituary | March 24, 2024 | Salem, WV
data.text:
David P Fisher, 70 of Big Isaac Community Salem passed away on Sunday, March 24, 2024 at his home. He was born March 17, 1954 in Charleston, son of the late David Alexander and Susie Ruth Bowling Fisher. He was a truck driver for several companies. He enjoyed riding his motorcycle, restoring old cars, and working on heavy equipment. He is survived by his wife Dianne Lynn Pratt Fisher. In addition to parents, David is preceded in death by his brother, Jeffery Alan Fisher in 2018. A Celebration of Life will be held at a later date. Davis Funeral Home and Crematory is handling the cremation and honored to serve the Fisher family. Online condolences can be made at www.davisfuneralhomewv.com.

To send flowers to the family or plant a tree in memory of David P Fisher, please visit our floral store.
